page.title: 06TRAFFIC SURVEYS: Lepton
page.content: {2)TRAFFIC SURVEY IN LEPTON VILLAGE Lorries 2 Bicycles etc. 1 Small vans 5 Buses 2 Cars 29 Large vans 1 The total number of vehicles counted was 40, or 160 vehicles per hour. { {TRAVEL As part of our questionnaire sent to local firms, we asked 69 employees how far and by what means they travelled to and from work each day. The replies gave us this information (the figures are percentages): {GETTING TO WORK} Walk 10 Motorcycle 9 Car 46 Bus 18 Cycle 17 {DISTANCE TRAVELLED (one way) 0-3 miles 48 3-10 miles 49 over 10 miles 3
